comment.author: 97533501@N00
comment._content:
This is William A. Gardner, Democrat, New York State Senator 1909-10, and mayor of Amsterdam, N.Y. in 1902-03 and 1930-31.  The 1909 New York Red Book has a photo of him, dressed differently, but almost identical in pose and face.

The Red Book also says he was born in Amsterdam, NY, in 1867, and is one of the foremost manufacturers of brooms.
